properties.address: Yaxley Library, Landsdowne Road, Yaxley PE7 3JL
properties.description: Facilities: Car park - the nearest car park is opposite the library, behind the shopping centre, Public transport - bus stop 100 yards away (Stagecoach 5) or one mile away on London Road, near Folly Close (Stagecoach 904 Peterborough to St Ives), Accessibility - wheelchair-friendly. The mezzanine area is up 8 steps and not wheelchair accessible. , Computers - available to book, Free WiFi - you don't need a library card to use this service

hours._text: Toasty Tuesdays - 9.30am to 5.30pm - Community Cafe offering free drinks and light meals from 10am to 4pm. Alongside the cafe is a Warm Hub for conversation, crafts, offering books, puzzles, games, live music on Tuesdays until 2pm. Cafe style concert between 1pm and 2pm until the end of November. Support with online applications, warmth and living essentials. Linking to other support partners too.

properties.title: St John's Church, Cathedral Square

hours._text: Wednesdays, 10am to 2pm. Community Cafe open on Wednesdays, 10am to 2pm and Thursdays, 2pm to 4pm.

Cafe open from 9am to 2pm each Wednesday, apart from the week between Christmas and New Year. Saturday Hub between 11am and 4pm from 3 December but closed on 24 and 31 December. An informal breakfast available on Christmas Day from 9am to 10.30am. Can do deliveries at other times and appointments.
